Package stocks

Interface BetterStock

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Stock
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvancedStock
    public interface BetterStock
extends Stock
    The BetterStock interface extends the functionality of the Stock interface to allow for the adjusting of stocks on a certain day.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void adjustSharesOnDay​(double shares, java.time.LocalDate date)
      The adjustShares method add the given number of shares to this stock's shares (number can be negative).
      double getSharesOnDay​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      The getSharesOnDay method returns the number of shares of a certain stock in a portfolio on the given date.
      java.lang.String getTransactions()
      The getTransaction method return a string output of the transaction history for this stock.
      double getValueOnDate​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      The getValueOnDate method searches through a BetterStocks transactions and return the current value of the stock on given date.
      void rebalanceStock​(double expectedValue, java.time.LocalDate date)
      The re-balanceStock method re-balances a single stock to the expected value on the given date.

      • Methods inherited from interface stocks.Stock

        adjustShares, getPriceOnDay, getShares, getTicker

    • Method Detail

      • adjustSharesOnDay

        void adjustSharesOnDay​(double shares,
                       java.time.LocalDate date)
        The adjustShares method add the given number of shares to this stock's shares (number can be negative). An overall negative number of shares is not allowed.
        Parameters:
        shares - number of shares to add
        date - the date on which to buy or sell shares

      • getSharesOnDay

        double getSharesOnDay​(java.time.LocalDate date)
        The getSharesOnDay method returns the number of shares of a certain stock in a portfolio on the given date.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to search;

      • getValueOnDate

        double getValueOnDate​(java.time.LocalDate date)
        The getValueOnDate method searches through a BetterStocks transactions and return the current value of the stock on given date. If shares were purchased after the given date, they are not considered. If the given date is before the earliest purchase of shares, the value is 0.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to find the value
        Returns:
        the double value

      • getTransactions

        java.lang.String getTransactions()
        The getTransaction method return a string output of the transaction history for this stock.
        Returns:
        the string output

      • rebalanceStock

        void rebalanceStock​(double expectedValue,
                    java.time.LocalDate date)
        The re-balanceStock method re-balances a single stock to the expected value on the given date.
        Parameters:
        expectedValue - the expected value for the given stock
        date - the date on which t0 re-balance
